entry.sentence: `` Actually , we should still be grateful to the truck driver , because without that accident we would n't have met . ''
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (`` ``) (ADVP (RB Actually)) (, ,) (NP (PRP we)) (VP (MD should) (ADVP (RB still)) (VP (VB be) (ADJP (JJ grateful) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT the) (NN truck) (NN driver)))) (, ,) (SBAR (IN because) (S (PP (IN without) (NP (DT that) (NN accident))) (NP (PRP we)) (VP (MD would) (RB n't) (VP (VB have) (VP (VBN met)))))))) (. .) ('' '')))
entry.deps: advmod(grateful-8, Actually-2) nsubj(grateful-8, we-4) aux(grateful-8, should-5) advmod(grateful-8, still-6) cop(grateful-8, be-7) root(ROOT-0, grateful-8) det(driver-12, the-10) nn(driver-12, truck-11) prep_to(grateful-8, driver-12) mark(met-22, because-14) det(accident-17, that-16) prep_without(met-22, accident-17) nsubj(met-22, we-18) aux(met-22, would-19) neg(met-22, n't-20) aux(met-22, have-21) advcl(grateful-8, met-22)

entry.sentence: `` Then let 's drink to the accident ! ''

entry.sentence: said Norbert with a grin , raising his glass .

entry.sentence: `` And to the fact that fate had mercy on us , '' Marissa added .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (`` ``) (FRAG (CC And) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN fact)) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (NN fate)) (VP (VBD had) (NP (NP (NN mercy)) (PP (IN on) (NP (PRP us)))))))))) (, ,) ('' '') (NP (NNP Marissa)) (VP (VBD added)) (. .)))

entry.sentence: And everyone knew what she meant .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (CC And) (NP (NN everyone)) (VP (VBD knew) (SBAR (WHNP (WP what)) (S (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD meant))))) (. .)))
